member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:PurdueIo.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.name: T:PurdueIo.Models.Catalog.Term
member.summary: Term model, representing each "semester"-like block of time. Terms can contain classes, but courses are perpetual - they never change. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! !! DO NOT MODIFY THIS CLASS UNLESS YOU ARE FAMILIAR WITH MIGRATIONS !! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

member.name: P:PurdueIo.Models.Catalog.Term.TermId
member.summary: Unique ID with which to reference the term internally.

member.summary: Short term code such as "fall14" referred to by course catalog.

member.summary: The date on which the term starts.

member.summary: The date on which the term ends.

member.summary: Queryable list of classes that occur in this term.
